document.full_text: eighty-nine percent of new yorkers approve of how police handle the threat of terrorism, reaffirming police commissioner ray kelly as the most popular public official in the city, a poll said on thursday.
document.title: new yorkers pleased with police on terrorism: poll
lines_and_colors: eighty-nine percent of new yorkers approve of how police handle the threat of terrorism, reaffirming police commissioner ray kelly as the most popular public official in the city, a poll said on thursday.
